page.title: 07Things to do in St Davids
page.content: There are lots of things to do for children of my age in St Davids.Some of these are football training, badminton, cubs & scouts, swimming, piano lessons and the Cathedral choir. I go to cubs & badminton and I am going to join football training. There are things for older kids aswell like scouts & Air Training Corps. I go to cubs because its good fun going on trips and camp and I just enjoy it. Badminton is good fun when we have tournaments and play so many matches each. I like playing singles because you have to do all the work yourself.
